alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 22 at 6:00PM EDT until March 22 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT/515 PM CDT/ FOR SOUTHEASTERN STARKE AND MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 600 PM EDT/500 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Culver, or 7 miles southwest of Plymouth, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Plymouth, Bourbon, Argos, Culver, Walnut, Tippecanoe, Oak Grove, Ober, Inwood, Twin Lakes, Rutland, Burr Oak, Maxinkuckee, Hibbard, Old Tip Town, Donaldson, Grovertown, Ora, Winona and Bass Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
